Geometry Utilities¶

Utilities that relate to simple 2D geometry analysis GeometryUtils

Methods

GeometryUtils.circularity_measure(poly)[source]¶

Measure the circularity of a polygon

Parameters:polygon (shapely_polygon.geometry.polygon) – shapely polygon
Returns:the circularity measure

The circularity is measured by:

\[C = \frac{\ell^2}{4\pi A}\]

where \(\ell\) is the perimeter and \(A\) is the area of the polygon

GeometryUtils.curve2shapely(contour, crs=(0, 0), eps=0.2)[source]¶

Convert matplotlib curves to shapely geometry

Parameters:
  • contour (list) – a list of contours generated by matplotlib
  • crs (tuple) – coordinate system to move the curves to the original system (min_x, min_y)
  • eps – threshold for closed polygon. If smaller – the curve is a polygon. Default: 0.2
Returns:

polygons that enable easier work (vectoric)
Return type:

list of shapely_polygon.geometry.polygon.Polygon
GeometryUtils.fit_circle_GH(xy, r_approx)[source]¶

Fit a circle using Gauss-Helmert model :param xy: :return:

GeometryUtils.fit_line_LS(xy)[source]¶

fit a line to xy points by linear least squares

Parameters:xy (np.array (nx2)) – points coordinates
Returns:x0: fitted coefficients, RMSE: root mean squared error, v
Return type:tuple

The model:

\[y = ax + b\]
GeometryUtils.point_on_polygon(poly, pointset, leafsize=40)[source]¶

Find the point along the polygon

Parameters:
  • poly (shapely_polygon.geometry.polygon.Polygon) – the bounding polygon within which the points should be found
  • pointset (DataClasses.PointSet.PointSet,) – the point cloud in which points are searched
  • leafsize (int) – size of a leaf for the KDtree. Default: 40.
Returns:

closest points from the point cloud to the polygon
Return type:

DataClasses.PointSubSet.PointSubSet
GeometryUtils.points_in_polygon(multi_p, poly, pointset)[source]¶

Finds all points that are within a polygon

Parameters:
  • multi_p (shapely_polygon.geometry.point) – the point cloud as a shapely MultiPoint
  • pointset (DataClasses.PointSet.PointSet,) – the point cloud in which points are searched
  • poly (shapely_polygon.geometry.polygon) – the bounding polygon within which the points should be found
Returns:

all points within the polygon
Return type:

DataClasses.PointSubSet.PointSubSet
GeometryUtils.polygon_to_linestring(pols)[source]¶

Converts shapely polygons to shapely linestrings

Parameters:pols (list of shapely_polygon.geometry.polygon.Polygon) – polygons to convert
Returns:list of lines
Return type:list
GeometryUtils.reclassify_shapely(shapes, eps=0.2)[source]¶

Reclassifies shapely shapes into Polygons and LineString according to a new threshold

Parameters:
  • shapes (list, shapely.geometry.LineString.LineString, shapely.geometry.polygon.Polygon) – shapes to be reclassified
  • eps – the new threshold according to which the shape is classified as a Polygon of LineString
Returns:

reclasiffied shapes
Return type:

list or shapely.geometry.LineString.LineString, shapely.geometry.polygon.Polygon
